long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds a fully functional shoutbox back to forums.wynncraft.com, recreated from scratch.

Traditional features:
-Real time chat straight on the forums
-No registration needed, it gets values straight from the site
-Automatic connecting and reconnecting
-Support for all forum themes
-Communication over secure protocols

New features:
-Customizable position on the sidebar
-Customizable message history length
-Turn off community section, just like old times
-Usable even without an account
-Optional timestamps, inspired by TaigaChat
-Configure options by clicking on the shoutbox title
